entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
